import React from 'react' import {useD} from 'rea' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' const header = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const userLogin=useSelector((state)=>state.userLogin) const { userInfo}=userLogin const logOutHandler=()=>{ console.log('logout Handler') } return (
Eshop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : Signin }
) } export default header
